shrimp.name: ShowFacing
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.rsl_code: $(Ci) = mix( color( 0, 1, 0), color(1, 0, 0), step(0, normalize(I).normalize(N))) * (0.5 * diffuse( faceforward( normalize(N), normalize(I))) );
shrimp.usage: Shows forward or backward facing surfaces - displays as green for forward facing, and red for backward facing. Output is multiplied by diffuse(Nf), to give an idea of the surface shape.
